name: Sniper Army Shooting
description:
Enjoy modern warzone with modern furry assassin sniper in the most dangerous desert mission. Start fighting in real time modern combat arena with gorilla commando skills. Become a modern furry assassin shooter and take shots by using sniper shots skills. Fulfill sniper assassin’s creed in Sniper Army Shooting commando mission provided with abundant latest ammunition and best possible shots. Show off your skills as sniper furry warrior in this sniper mission game.

Features:
Sniper fighting game
Extreme shooting action with real effects
Challenging missions for modern furry assassin shooter
Breathtaking realistic visuals
Hard shooting missions in best sniper shooting game
Excellent artificial intelligence and real physics based game
Efficient weapon controls & movement
Stunning graphics and outstanding sound effects
Perfect action fight simulation
